content: Apple has never been afraid of cannibalization. A few examples: iPhone and iPod Touch, iPad Air and 10" iPad Pro, MacBook Air and 12" MacBook Pro… In my opinion, the main issue is that they may lack dedicated developers: As reported recently, developers at Apple must do iOS first, and everything else second. If this is true, it would explain why it took 2 years to port NightShift to the Mac!
